name: Enuma, Inc.
description: Developer of a game-based learning application designed to support and empower children to be independent learners. The company's application offers practice and support for preschool through second-grade math skills and a flexible learning architecture that includes a suite of mini-games, books, videos, and quizzes along with a free-reign library, enabling children to gain confidence and independence while building foundational skills.
one_liner: Developer of a game-based learning application designed to support and empower children to be independent learners. The company's application offers practice and support for preschool through second-grade math skills and a flexible learning architecture that includes a suite of mini-games, books, videos, and quizzes along with a free-reign library, enabling children to gain confidence and independence while building foundational skills.
